title: When did Van Halen appear on Saturday Night Live? - Quora

response.answer_text: It was Feb 28th, 1987, and apparently was a barely rehearsed improptu appearance. . Story told well by G.E. Smith, SNL bandleader:  Actual performance at page below. He shredded. . . . Eddie Van Halen's 1987 SNL Performance Resurfaces and He's Absolutely Flawless
Van Halen never officially appeared on SNL, but Eddie sat in with the SNL band and was in one sketch when his then-wife Valerie Bertinelli hosted in 1987.
